name: Manuscript (pre-ALPHA)
description:
Pre-alpha of "Manuscript", just uploading for a few friends to check out.

Change log

v0.4

Added buttons and first attempt at mobile support

v0.3

Added a ledger line

Removed the 3 or 4 after the note name (i.e. C instead of C3)

Added upper/lower bounds for player movement (inc. no more left and right, sorry!)

v0.2 

Sorted issue with sounds clipping/overlapping (uses "PlayOneShot()" instead of "Play()")

Wishlist

- Mobile controls

- Timer/challenge

- Change of clefs

- Ledger lines (appear on hover)
